t: Amazon is now replacing customers' discontinued Cloud Cams with new Blink Mini devices | TechCrunch
s: November 7, 2022 - The email thanks customers for their support and informs them that, for every active Cloud Cam device they own, Amazon will offer users a complimentary Blink Mini and a one-year Blink Subscription Plus Plan, which covers all the devices under a Blink account.
